content.body: Hello all... hope you're all well. I'd like to see about getting a new proposal on the agenda (possibly march?) It's an alternative take on the existing base64 proposal that covers hex, base64, and base32 encoding -- https://github.com/jasnell/tc39-proposal-hex-base64    (the existing base64 proposal is here: https://github.com/tc39/proposal-arraybuffer-base64)
